name: Tastes like Coffee
description:
It's a late night and there's not a soul in sight... Until one lone customer walks into your coffee shop. Make drinks, lend an ear, and maybe even make a friend.

CONTAINS:
  • very simple drinkcrafting system☕
  • a burned out comic creator (not you!)
  • an android barista (that's you!)
  • original soundtrack by my epic friend (and featuring another swag artist)
  • Some Bad Endings, a Mid Ending, a Good Ending, and a True Ending
CREDITS:
  • daniople - writer, programmer, sprite artist
  • CaffeDoro - assistant writer
  • graphiteonwhite - assistant programmer
  • Shauntaro - background artist
  • temathy - musician
  • SupItsZaire - featured musician (https://twitter.com/SupItsZaire)

Fonts Used: Boba Date by salinsley!
